body_html: I don’t know if you are expecting a reply from me but this solution would be great! One option would be to put them alongside the release versions and change the version number to something along the lines of 1.11-nightly, or even just nightly.
body_text: I don’t know if you are expecting a reply from me but this solution would be great! One option would be to put them alongside the release versions and change the version number to something along the lines of 1.11-nightly, or even just nightly.
body: I don’t know if you are expecting a reply from me but this solution would be great! One option would be to put them alongside the release versions and change the version number to something along the lines of `1.11-nightly`, or even just `nightly`.
